[very sad] Seven years of practice and I made a first-year mistake. 

[mumbling] I keep thinking about her face when I explained what happened. She didn't even get angry, she just looked... confused. Like, how could this happen? [sigh] And I had to sit there knowing that, um... knowing that it was my fault. [very quietly] I don't know if I can do this anymore.
